description:
The baseball match with D`Arby continues within DIO`s mansion. For some reason, Jotaro starts declaring his pitches to D`Arby. D`Arby finds Jotaro`s actions strange, but still believes he has the upper hand because of his Stand`s abilities.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akuu no Shouki Vanilla Ice: Sono 1
The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 1
亜空の瘴気 ヴァニラ・アイス その1
